Ellie TenEyck was recognized as a proficiency award recipient in Agricultural Services by the Missouri State FFA Association. The awards are a summary of students Supervised Agricultural Experience encompassing several years of work. Ellie's SAE is working at United State Bank.
Highland High School is spotlighting our 2020 Seniors through May 15th. This spotlight features JT McDermott. We are proud of all your accomplishments, and we miss you JT!!
